productEmsList.title: Built-in Dash Cam
productEmsList.tooltip: Built-in dash cam continuously records your drive and automatically saves video of incidents; GPS records where and when events occurred

productEmsList.title: Amazon Alexa built-in
productEmsList.tooltip: With Amazon Alexa, you can enjoy the ultimate voice-controlled, hands-free experience. Ask Alexa to play music, check the news, weather and more.

productEmsList.title: Map Coverage
productEmsList.tooltip:
U.S. and Canada: Includes preloaded street maps for the lower 49 states plus Alaska, Canada, Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands and Bahamas.

North America: Includes preloaded street maps for the U.S., Mexico, Canada, Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands and Bahamas.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.
